Key Match Events: Kylian Mbappé scored a penalty in the 56th minute
Lewandowski scored a penalty in the 79th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Mbappé was expected to be 100% operational for France's final group game of the European Championships
France need just a point to assure themselves of a top-two finish
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match between France and Poland ended 1-1
Mbappé was part of the France matchday squad for the stalemate with the Netherlands, but did not start the contest
Others: Paderborn's players were told not to go in too hard on Mbappé in order to let the Frenchman enjoy a simple re-integration into the team
